attributes.action: Fine the bbc and make them take an oath saying they will only report the truth about the conflict in palestine
attributes.additional_details: First of all I want the government to speak out and say the truth, we all know that the bbc headlines are extremely bias towards the Zionist government. I would like the government to send aid for palestine and Atleast speak out.The conflict has now taken another life of a child who was burnt alive how can this be allowed to continue? How many more children have to die before something is done?
